title: Namshi - Shop Fashion & Beauty

creator: Namshi
descriptionHtml:
The Namshi shopping app is your no.1 fashion & beauty destination in Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Oman, Bahrain, Qatar & Iraq.

Enjoy online shopping with over 1,300 brands and more than 130,000 products across clothing, sportswear, footwear, accessories, beauty, fragrances, gift ideas and more.

Appreciate the advantages of on-the-go shopping online & use our easy filters to find exactly what you’ve been searching for, all in one online shopping destination.

Delve into our shopping collections at Namshi:

Women’s Fashion from all top brands for clothes, shoes, bags, accessories, modest wear, dresses, Arabian clothing from brands like Trendyol, Adidas, Nike, Ella, Ginger, Skechers, Mango & Swarovski.

Kids latest fashion styles to match their growing needs with unbeatable sales on shoes and clothes from Mango kids, Minoti, Nike, Reebok & Adidas.

Men’s Shopping has never been this convenient. Choose from the latest men’s suits, shoes, sportswear, sneakers, bags, perfumes & accessories from all the top brands like Adidas, Nike & Puma, Jack & Jones, Calvin Klein, Lacoste, Topman & Tommy Hilfiger.

Our premium collection brings you luxurious bags, outfits, jewellery & fragrances to your door step from top designers like Armani Exchange, Karl Lagerfeld, Lacoste, Love Moschino, Michael Kors & more. You can also shop all make-up brands when browsing the beauty products and perfumes section of Namshi.

Find out about the latest offers and discounts that we offer throughout the year. Namshi online shopping app brings you the best deals and the latest fashion discounts as well as access to the newest arrivals.

Download the Namshi fashion and beauty app for Google and enjoy:

★ Fashion at your fingertips with hundreds of daily new arrivals in apparel, modestwear, sportswear, footwear, beauty, bags, and accessories
★ Instant alerts about exclusive offers, new arrivals and all the latest trends
★ Sort products by popularity and price, then refine your search by brand, size and colour
★ Take a closer look at products with the app’s zoom capability
★ Add items to your wish list to save for later
★ Share your picks with friends and family via Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram
★ Choose your preferred payment option to maximise the convenience of online shopping
★ Manage and personalise your account for relevant updates sent straight to your phone

Use Namshi’s App online shopping app and ensure speedy delivery right to your door. Download it now for fast, seamless online shopping, wherever you go.

Our benefits:
✓ Contactless Delivery
✓ We offer Buy Now and Pay Later option
✓ 100% Genuine Products
✓ Same Day Delivery in the UAE
✓ Next Day Delivery across GCC*
✓ Worldwide Shipping
✓ Get a free exchange/return within 14 days of purchase

----------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer : Please note that Namshi does not offer any coupons or discounts for downloading our application. If you have seen ads promoting such offers, please inform our customer service team at service@namshi.com.

Follow us on Facebook (fb.com/namshifans), Twitter (@NamshiDotCom) and Instagram (@Namshi).

title: Namshi - Shop Fashion & Beauty

creator: Namshi
descriptionHtml:
It’s time to move. Namshi is igniting a new generation of personal expression through fashion. With on-the-go online shopping, the tools you need to express your dynamic, bold, fun and rebellious self is right at your fingertips. Everyone has style, and we’re promoting individualism. We encourage every person to be who they are, express it and live it to the max.


We’ve got:
1,800+ brands and 200,000+ products across clothing, modest wear, footwear, beauty, sportswear, accessories & more


We’re making moves in:
Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, Oman, Bahrain, Qatar & Iraq


We’re moving with:
adidas, Trendyol, Nike, Ella, Ginger, Skechers, Mango, Calvin Klein, Lacoste, Topshop, Charlotte Tilbury, MAC Cosmetics & more
